segments.text: All except the back door . I left that open for Tim . He took the dog for a walk .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm going on to bed . I'm beat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'm going to stay up a while . I've got to go over the household budget . We're a little overspent this month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please tell Tim to close the door to the basement . I don't want the dog down there tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Good night . See you at breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2
